_meanings:
An
affix added to nouns in the sense
of ‘measuring as much as’, ‘as 

high or long, or broad as,’ 
‘reaching as far as;’ as in {#UrumAtrI BittiH#}
{#paMcadaSayojanamAtramaDvAnamaticakrAma#} <ls>K.</ls>;
(in this sense the word may as
well be considered to be {#mAtrA#} at the
end of <ab>comp.</ab> <ab>q. v.</ab> below).

{@--1@}
A measure, whether of length,
breadth, height, size, space, 
distance or number; usually at the
end of <ab>comp.</ab> {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} {#aMgulimAtraM#} a 
‘finger's breadth’; {#kiMcinmAtraM gatvA#} ‘to
some distance’; {#kroSamAtre#} ‘at the
distance of a Krośa’, {#reKAmAtramapi#}
‘even the breadth of a line, as much
as a line’; <ls>R. 1. 17</ls>; so {#kzaRamAtra, ni#}
{#mizamAtraM#} ‘the space of an instant;’
{#SatamAtra#} ‘a hundred in number’; so
{#gajamAtra#} ‘as high or big as an 
elephant’; {#tAlama tra, yavamAtra#} &c.
